title: A Status Report On The Kansas City Royals
teaser: The Kansas City Royals were the impossible underdogs in last season's World Series. This year, their season has been marred by brawls, suspensions and batters hit intentionally. The key to understanding all this lies in the unwritten rules of baseball, and the somewhat awkward way the upstart Royals are trying to navigate them.
